ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Some Guk questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Yup, myself and a guild-mate completed the Lambent BP quest this way about 2 weeks ago: we grouped, she handed over the Carapace and I handed over the Lute of
ygData.messageBody:
Yup, myself and a guild-mate completed the Lambent BP quest this way about 2
weeks ago: we grouped, she handed over the Carapace and I handed over the
Lute of the Gypsy Princess and Lambent Rubies.

I'm not sure if it's actually necessary to group beforehand, but I would...
better to be safe than sorry.

-KS

>does the trick of having two people hand in the peices in succession
still work at the temple or RO? IE can he hand in the icy greaves
(whatever they are killed) then I hand in the shin greaves and gem(s)?
